728954f-a.text:
76 Hopping Avenue, west of the S.W. corner of Patten Street, showing the rear of the Edward M. Hansen residence.
July 2, 1927.
P.L. Sperr
(2)
A close view of the rose arber in the rear of the house. The housw, on the left, is number 82 Hopping Avenue.
July 2, 1927.
P.L. Sperr
(3)
The garage and rose bushes in rear of the Hansen residence.
July 2, 1927.
P.L. Sperr
